title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 7B.10 - Higher Fines Zone Signs (R2-10, R2-11) and Plaques
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 7B.10 - Higher Fines Zone Signs (R2-10, R2-11) and Plaques

State Regulations
DELETE the entire section. INSERT the following paragraphs: Support: 00A New York State law does not define "school zone" and
does not provide for increased fines for violations in school zones. 00B The New York State Vehicle and Traffic Law ยง
1180(h)(4) provides for higher fines when convicted of violating a school speed
limit. Standard: 00C A FINES HIGHER (R2-6P) plaque (see Figure 7B-1) shall
be installed as a supplement to the first reduced school speed limit sign in a
reduced school speed zone to identify the beginning point of the higher fines
zone. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
7B.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
